public: virtual void AddAndTrackValidationAttributes(Microsoft::AspNetCore::Mvc::Rendering::ViewContext ^ viewContext, Microsoft::AspNetCore::Mvc::ViewFeatures::ModelExplorer ^ modelExplorer, System::String ^ expression, System::Collections::Generic::IDictionary<System::String ^, System::String ^> ^ attributes);

Docs.param: A instance for the current scope.
Expression name, relative to the current model.
The to receive the validation attributes. Maps the validation attribute names to their values. Values must be HTML encoded before they are written to an HTML document or response.
Docs.summary: Adds validation-related HTML attributes to the if client validation is enabled and validation attributes have not yet been added for this in the current <form>.
Docs.remarks: Tracks the in the current to avoid generating duplicate validation attributes. That is, validation attributes are added only if no previous call has added them for a field with this name in the <form>.

The to receive the validation attributes. Maps the validation attribute names to their values. Values must be HTML encoded before they are written to an HTML document or response.
Docs.summary: Adds validation-related HTML attributes to the if client validation is enabled.
Docs.remarks: Adds nothing to if client-side validation is disabled.
